family.name: Quad-LN
family.comment: The Quad-LN is programmed in OPs mode except for the address.

variable.label: Servo1 Swap Endpoints
variable.comment: Matches Closed/Thrown commands to the desired endpoints

variable.label: Servo2 Swap Endpoints
variable.comment: Matches Closed/Thrown commands to the desired endpoints

variable.label: Servo3 Swap Endpoints
variable.comment: Matches Closed/Thrown commands to the desired endpoints

variable.label: Servo4 Swap Endpoints
variable.comment: Matches Closed/Thrown commands to the desired endpoints

factReset.label: Restore All CVs to Factory Defaults. Device Address=11000
Restore Addresses to Factory Defaults. Device Address=11000
Restore Servo and Input CVs to Factory Defaults

display.label: Desired Servo Start Address
display.tooltip: Desired address of first servo. Entry will be rounded down to a block-of-eight boundary (1, 9 ,... 2033).
display.label: Servo Start Address
Desired Sensor Start Address
display.tooltip: Desired address of first sensor. Entry will be rounded down block-of-eight boundary (1, 9, ... 4089).
display.label: Sensor Start Address
AutoAlign Current
display.tooltip: Current limit for AutoAlignment: 10-80 (typ) or 0 for manual preset selection
display.label: AutoAlign Current
Lock Indicator
display.tooltip: Lock state to indicate on LED
display.label: Lock Indicator
Servo State Memory
display.tooltip: Retain servo states when powered down
display.label: Servo State Memory
Retry on DCC Busy
display.tooltip: Retry Switch Requests when they aren't relayed to DCC by the Command Station
display.label: DCC Busy Retry
Output Off Switch Request
display.tooltip: Send an Output Off Switch Request following every Output On request
display.label: Send Output Off
Local Actions
display.tooltip: Provide visibililty on Loconet for local actions
display.label: Local Actions

label.text: ***JMRI INTERNAL USE ONLY BELOW THIS POINT*** To change the Servo or Sensor Start Address edit the Desired Start Address variable above.

display.label: Address LT
display.tooltip: To change, adjust Servo Base Addr on Quad-LN pane
display.label: Address
Lock LT
display.tooltip: To change, adjust Servo Base Addr on Quad-LN pane
display.label: Address
Orientation
display.tooltip: Matches Closed/Thrown commands to physical servo installation
display.label: Orientation
Directional Speed
display.tooltip: enables separate speed setting for travel in the Thrown direction
display.label: Directional Speed
Mode
display.tooltip: Controls Lock via Turnout at addr of servo + 4
display.label: Mode
Midpoint
display.tooltip: Enables move to midpoint when Lock Turnout is Thrown
display.label: Mode
Output Msg
display.tooltip: Report turnout state without position feedback sensors
display.label: Output Msg
Address LS
display.tooltip: To change, adjust Sensor Base Addr on Quad-LN pane
display.label: Address
Trigger
display.tooltip: Change on input that triggers Action and Message
display.label: Trigger
DCC Freeze
display.tooltip: Freeze the local input value when the DCC signal is not present
display.label: DCC Freeze
Message
display.tooltip: Message sent when local input triggers
display.label: Message
LED Mode
display.tooltip: Enables LED drive and blinking options
display.label: LED Mode
LED Sense
display.tooltip: Swaps LED drive so panel matches turnout
display.label: LED Sense
